metadata.title: RZ/V2L: Is it possible to build an interface compliant with BT656?

sections.content:
Question:
Is it possible to build a BT656 compliant interface using GPIO?
Answer:
MIPI CSI has dedicated pins. However, the Parallel Input Interface does not provide dedicated pins, but rather dual-use pins.
The default setting is to set the GPIO pin to the Camera In function pin. It is possible to use the Parallel Input Interface to input BT.656 data.
Suitable Products
RZ/V2L
